entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
